mapper.sql: select T.ROW_ID as id, date_format(T.CREATED,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') as created, T.CREATED_BY as createdBy, date_format(T.LAST_UPD, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') as lastUpdated, T.LAST_UPD_BY as lastUpdatedBy, t.TARGET_PHONE targetPhone, t.CONTEXT context, date_format(t.EXPIRE_TIME, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') as expireTime, t.TYPE type
mapper.insert: insert into CX_O_SMS_LOG (ROW_ID, TARGET_PHONE, CONTEXT, EXPIRE_TIME, TYPE) values (#{id},#{targetPhone},#{context},#{expireTime},#{type})
